Name: Jessey's Group
description:
Jessey is 51 years old and has 4 children. He is a group leader and is representing his group formed by 5 farmers in Webuye District, Kenya.

Jessey has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely as a result of his desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods and, although he described his last harvest as poor, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Jessey also decided to purchase a solar light as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Jessey's group will be able to receive a total of 3 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 3.25 acres.
